mapper.sql: actionId, actionBranchId, actionStartDate, actionIntro, actionName, actionAddress, actionStatus, actionEnroll, actionTotal
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from action
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert:
insert into action
actionId,
actionBranchId,
actionStartDate,
actionIntro,
actionName,
actionAddress,
actionStatus,
actionEnroll,
actionTotal,
#{actionid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{actionbranchid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{actionstartdate,jdbcType=DATE},
#{actionintro,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{actionname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{actionaddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{actionstatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{actionenroll,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{actiontotal,jdbcType=INTEGER},
mapper.update:
update action
actionId = #{record.actionid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
actionBranchId = #{record.actionbranchid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
actionStartDate = #{record.actionstartdate,jdbcType=DATE},
actionIntro = #{record.actionintro,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
actionName = #{record.actionname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
actionAddress = #{record.actionaddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
actionStatus = #{record.actionstatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
actionEnroll = #{record.actionenroll,jdbcType=INTEGER},
actionTotal = #{record.actiontotal,jdbcType=INTEGER},

update action set actionId = #{record.actionid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, actionBranchId = #{record.actionbranchid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, actionStartDate = #{record.actionstartdate,jdbcType=DATE}, actionIntro = #{record.actionintro,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, actionName = #{record.actionname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, actionAddress = #{record.actionaddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, actionStatus = #{record.actionstatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, actionEnroll = #{record.actionenroll,jdbcType=INTEGER}, actionTotal = #{record.actiontotal,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update action
actionBranchId = #{actionbranchid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
actionStartDate = #{actionstartdate,jdbcType=DATE},
actionIntro = #{actionintro,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
actionName = #{actionname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
actionAddress = #{actionaddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
actionStatus = #{actionstatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
actionEnroll = #{actionenroll,jdbcType=INTEGER},
actionTotal = #{actiontotal,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where actionId = #{actionid,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update action set actionBranchId = #{actionbranchid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, actionStartDate = #{actionstartdate,jdbcType=DATE}, actionIntro = #{actionintro,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, actionName = #{actionname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, actionAddress = #{actionaddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, actionStatus = #{actionstatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, actionEnroll = #{actionenroll,jdbcType=INTEGER}, actionTotal = #{actiontotal,jdbcType=INTEGER} where actionId = #{actionid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select * from action a where a.actionId in( select ar.ARecordActionId from actionrecord ar,olderbase ob where ob.olderId=ar.ARecordolderId and ar.ARecordolderId= #{olderid,jdbcType=INTEGER}) ORDER BY a.actionId desc

select * from action a where a.actionBranchId= #{olderbranchid,jdbcType=INTEGER} and a.actionId not in( select ar.ARecordActionId from actionrecord ar,olderbase ob where ob.olderId=ar.ARecordolderId and ar.ARecordolderId= #{olderid,jdbcType=INTEGER} ) ORDER BY a.actionId desc
